sentences.en: A funeral procession filled the street.
And a long - drawn procession of formidable names it was!
sentences.cn: 这一长串鼎鼎大名真吓人 啊 !

sentences.en: It was a seamless procession of wonderful electronic music.
sentences.cn: 这是一曲优美流畅的电子乐曲。

sentences.en: It was a very imposing procession of pretty faces and fine clothes.
sentences.cn: 这是一支由漂亮的脸蛋和华丽的衣着组成的队伍,十分壮观.

sentences.en: Musicians played at the front and rear of the procession.
sentences.cn: 乐师们在队前和队尾表演。

sentences.en: Soldiers escorted the royal procession and drummers gave warning of its approach.
sentences.cn: 士兵为皇家队伍护驾,鼓手为其鸣锣开道.

sentences.en: The grand procession moves slowly out of the temple.
sentences.cn: 这支庄严的队伍缓缓地走出庙堂.

sentences.en: The parson, heading the procession, had just turned right towards the churchyard.
sentences.cn: 走在行进队伍最前面的教区牧师刚刚向右转弯，朝着教堂墓地走去。

sentences.en: The procession made its way down the hill.
The procession moved at a slow and stately speed.
sentences.cn: 队伍以缓缓而庄严的速度行进.

sentences.en: The procession moved into the church.
The students entered the school in procession.
Their cars headed the funeral procession.
sentences.cn: 他们的车队在葬礼队伍的最前面.

sentences.en: Their grief turned to hysteria when the funeral procession arrived at the cemetery.
sentences.cn: 当送葬队走到墓地时，他们更加悲恸欲绝。

sentences.en: They marched in procession to the Capitol building.
sentences.cn: 他们列队向国会大厦行进。

sentences.en: Thou-sands of local people lined the streets and clapped as the procession went by.
sentences.cn: 数以千计的当地居民站在街道两旁，为由此经过的队伍鼓掌。

words.tran_cn: 经过特殊加工（或处理）的
过程，进行；方法，步骤；作用；程序；推移
开始；继续做；行进（proceed的ing形式）
开始；继续进行；发生；行进

trans.tran_cn: 队伍，行列，一列，一排，列队行进
trans.tran_en: a line of people or vehicles moving slowly as part of a ceremony
